'''Lantern-Lit Gathering''' is a part of the [[Springtime Charms]] event in [[Version 5.3]].

==Requirements==
The player may invite 1 character into their party once [[Festive Fever (Springtime Charms)|Festive Fever]] reaches 1,200.
